item.title: PHP 4.3.0RC4 Released
item.description: Despite our best efforts, it was necessary to make one more release candidate, hence PHP 4.3.0RC4.

item.title: PHP news feed available
item.description: The news of PHP.net is available now in RSS 1.0 format via our new news.rss file.
